Why a "coin burn" is not in the cards for Cardano...  1. All ~31B premined $ADA is already in circulation so there is no cache to burn 2. The ~14B balance (45B max supply minus 31B premined) will be minted as rewards during block production 3. $ADA is built for a global economy
